title: Schenck v US on free speech - contradict

content.prompt: The restrictions imposed by the Schenck decision most directly contradicted which of the following earlier developments in the United States?

choices.label: Arguments for self-government asserted in the Declaration of Independence
Protection of liberties through the adoption of the Bill of Rights in 1791
Assertion of federal power over states’ rights in the 1819 McCulloch v. Maryland decision
Expansion of voting rights during President Andrew Jackson’s administration

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
